Petitions to the Sirian Council to redirect the Alanians had failed, giving rise to the Alanian rebellion and Lumian-Sirian resistance. The Alanians were controlled by an elite group called the Tem- plar Solar Initiates, who had been entrusted with rulership and guardianship over the Alanian continent by the Sirian Council.
